## Reading data

```{r}
library(readr)
urlfile="https://github.com/owid/covid-19-data/raw/master/public/data/vaccinations/country_data/India.csv"
vaccdata_india<-read_csv(url(urlfile))
```

## About the data
```{r}
str(vaccdata_india)
na.omit(vaccdata_india)
colnames(vaccdata_india)
summary(vaccdata_india)
str(vaccdata_india)
```
